name: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix Mini-Game
summary: On the website for the video game Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix there was plans for a promotional mini-game to be released alongside it. The game was labeled as coming soon under the "Mini-Game" tab on the official website for the game, however was never released. No details of the game were ever released and it is uncertain what the contents of the game were to be, apart from the game being built in Adobe Flash based on the link being labeled as "flashgame" within the site's HTML code.
